questions:
What is the photo mainly about?
   A) A piece of furniture
   B) A landscape
   C) A group of people
   D) A building

   B) A chair
   C) A wardrobe or cabinet
   D) A table

   A) Metal
   B) Plastic
   C) Wood
   D) Glass

A) A tree
B) Two chairs 
C) A lamp
D) A painting

What is in the background of the photo?
   A) A forest
